results.content: Very clear and useful but it will be nice to make the cursor red or black so we can follow you clicks. Sometimes your clicking is so fast I do not know what you click to bring up a certain page during your course. Otherwise very good

results.content: A really good introductory course for Elementor based on pre-2.x version and using Astra as the theme. Will give would-be web designers some useful insights into the overall process of being a web designer/developer but is not (IMHO) intended solely as an Elementor design and development course.
